# Short description
A practical OSINT toolkit — curated scripts, notebooks, and guides for responsible open‑source intelligence collection, enrichment, analysis, and reporting.

# Long description
OSINT is a hands‑on repository for researchers, defenders, journalists, and analysts who need reproducible workflows for open‑source intelligence. It bundles ready‑to‑run scripts, Jupyter notebooks, utilities, example queries and templates to collect, enrich, correlate, visualize, and report findings — with an emphasis on automation, reproducibility, and responsible/ethical use. Use it as a reference library, learning resource, or a starting point for building your own OSINT pipelines.
